packages.name: India
packages.description: Explore the rich history and vibrant culture of India. From the majestic Taj Mahal to the bustling streets of Mumbai, there's an adventure waiting at every corner.

packages.name: Switzerland
packages.description: Discover the serene landscapes of Switzerland with its picturesque mountains and peaceful lakes. Perfect for skiing in winter and hiking in summer.

packages.name: Latvia
packages.description: Visit Latvia, a hidden gem in Europe known for its medieval architecture, pristine forests, and the vibrant capital city, Riga.

packages.name: France
packages.description: Experience the romance of France, from the charming streets of Paris to the lavender fields of Provence and the stunning Riviera coastline.

packages.name: Japan
packages.description: Immerse yourself in the unique culture of Japan, where ancient traditions blend with modern technology. Explore bustling Tokyo, historic Kyoto, and the beautiful cherry blossoms.

packages.name: Australia
packages.description: Adventure awaits in Australia, from the iconic Sydney Opera House to the Great Barrier Reef and the mysterious Outback.

packages.name: Brazil
packages.description: Experience the vibrant culture of Brazil, known for its lively festivals, stunning beaches, and the Amazon rainforest.

packages.name: Egypt
packages.description: Step back in time and explore the mysteries of Egypt. Visit the Great Pyramids of Giza, the Sphinx, and cruise the Nile River.

packages.name: South Africa
packages.description: Discover the diverse landscapes and wildlife of South Africa. Go on a safari in Kruger National Park and explore the vibrant city of Cape Town.
